title: Why do I feel when I sing I can't fully open my voice even with practice? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think you've got to sing for yourself and leave the judging aside. Try it out !. The moment you start get conscious of your voice I think that's when you start noticing the details and it can pretty much make you feel uncomfortable. Practice well and enjoy the ride. I am not a professional singer but I this is a common issue with many people who are interested in singing. Find your comfort range and sing within them and I gradually add higher notes along the way. Hope I got your question answered. Cheers !!!
